hero.title: NUTPAM 2025
hero.subtitle: Hackathon & Workshop
hero.description: Join us for an innovative one-day workshop and hackathon featuring NoCodeML and cutting-edge problem-solving challenges.

about.title: About NUTPAM 2025
about.description: NUTPAM 2025 is a premier hackathon and workshop event designed to bring together innovative minds to solve real-world problems using cutting-edge technology and NoCodeML solutions.

events.title: NoCodeML Workshop
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of NoCodeML and its applications in real-world scenarios

events.title: Problem Statements Disclosure
events.description: Discover the exciting challenges you'll be solving during the hackathon

events.title: Hackathon Begins
events.description: Start building your innovative solutions with your team

events.title: Level 1 Review
events.description: Present your progress and get valuable feedback from mentors

events.title: Final Review
events.description: Showcase your completed solutions to the judging panel

events.title: Winners Announcement
events.description: Celebrate the most innovative solutions and award ceremony
